channel.title: Overview on Tech.Feminizidmap.org
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Tech.Feminizidmap.org

item.title: Mapper
item.description: 🗃️ Mapper is the main database interface app. It contains the user management, data entry and organisation and exposes a REST API.

item.title: Briefkasten
item.description: 📮 Briefkasten is a standalone app used for case reporting. It renders a form from configuration and forwards submitted content to the desired email address.
